resources:
Simpsons Minor Characters Quotes Main fragment All images are taken from the Simpsons wiki: http://simpsons.wikia.com/wiki/Simpsons_Wiki Credit Tap on the character names to read my favorite quote from each character Help Yes Is this button working This was made by Clayton Brimm. By day he lives the life of a mild mannered programmer. By night he is a very impatient and angry programmer. Developer
Hans Moleman
Mr. Sparkle
Hank Scorpio
Dr. Nick Riviera
Gil Gunderson
Superintendent Chalmers
Otto Mann
//array of strings that are the quotes from each character
\"The eating of an orange is a lot like a good marriage.\"
\"I am the harsh nemesis of all that is unclean!!! Taste the zestful bubbling foam of my vengeance!\"
\"By the way, what""\'""s your least favorite country, Italy or France?\"
\"The kneebone""\'""s connected to the... something. The something""\'""s connected to the... red thing. The red thing""\'""s connected to my wrist watch... Uh oh.\"
\"Put in a good word for your buddy Gil…the wolves are at Old Gil’s door…oh boy\"
\"The Aurora Borealis? At this time of year? At this time of day? In this part of the country? Localized entirely within your kitchen?\"
\"Wow. I""\'""ve never been referred to as an adult before. I""\'""ve been tried as one.\"
